name: Infinite Space Runner
description:
This is a game that I created over the past week for a small game jam type thing. Enjoy! The player can control the scale of gravity with the W and S keys. The enemies are created entirely through code. There are some neat linear interpolations and sine wave things going on in the code via the coin spawn and the dark gray enemy.

Code: https://github.com/JakeC9589/InfiniteSpaceRunner
